sentences.en: ‘I don’t want to go.’ ‘Nor do I.’
sentences.cn: “我不想去。”“我也不想去。”

sentences.en: He can neither read nor write (= he cannot read or write ).
sentences.cn: 他既不会读也不会写。

sentences.en: He has neither friends nor relatives.
sentences.cn: 他没有朋友也没有亲人。

sentences.en: He likes his tea neither too hot nor too cold.
sentences.cn: 他想要杯不凉不热的茶。

sentences.en: Hilary was neither shocked nor surprised by the news.
sentences.cn: 希拉里对这个消息既没有感到震惊，也没有觉得意外。

sentences.en: I couldn't make head nor tail of the damn film.
sentences.cn: 这部该死的影片我一点儿都看不懂。

sentences.en: I have neither bag nor wallet.
sentences.cn: 我既没有包也没有钱夹。

sentences.en: I have received neither an acknowledgment nor a reply.
sentences.cn: 我未收到任何复函或答复。

sentences.en: I'm not coming back up here. Never, for love nor money.
sentences.cn: 我不打算再回这里了，绝对不回了。

sentences.en: I'm sixty-two. I feel sixty-two, neither more nor less.
sentences.cn: 我现在62岁了，感觉自己也确实到这把年纪了。

sentences.en: Neither Anna nor I are interested in high finance.
sentences.cn: 安娜和我对巨额融资都不感兴趣。

sentences.en: Neither he nor his arch-rival, Giuseppe De Rita, won.
sentences.cn: 他和他的死对头朱塞佩·德里察双双落败。

sentences.en: Neither Matt nor Julie said anything.
sentences.cn: 马特和朱莉都没有说什么。

sentences.en: Neither Mr Rose nor Mr Woodhead was available for comment yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天罗斯先生和伍德黑德先生都无暇发表意见。

sentences.en: Nor does scientific knowledge derive straightforwardly from experiments and observations.
sentences.cn: 科学知识也并非简单地从试验和观察中得来。

sentences.en: Nor is acid rain always, and universally, a bad thing.
sentences.cn: 酸雨也并非在任何情况下都是坏事。

sentences.en: Notices in the waiting room requested that you neither smoke nor spit.
sentences.cn: 候车室的公告牌要求人们不要吸烟和随地吐痰。

sentences.en: That, if you'll pardon my saying so, is neither here nor there.
sentences.cn: 恕我直言，那根本就不重要。

sentences.en: They can neither read nor write, nor can they comprehend such concepts.
sentences.cn: 他们不会读，不会写，也理解不了这样的概念。

sentences.en: They couldn’t understand it at the time, and nor could we. ＃
sentences.cn: 他们当时无法理解，我们也是。

sentences.en: This clock neither gains nor loses.
sentences.cn: 这钟走得既不快也不慢。

sentences.en: This novel is not science fiction, nor is it Gothic horror.
sentences.cn: 这本小说既非科幻小说亦非哥特派恐怖小说。

sentences.en: We must be realistic in our self-estimation, neither being conceited nor belittling ourselves.
sentences.cn: 我们对自己的估计应该实事求是， 不要自高自大， 也不要妄自菲薄。

sentences.en: Whether or not he realised the fact was neither here nor there.
sentences.cn: 他是否认识到事实真相无关紧要。

trans.tran_en: used after a negative statement to say that the negative statement is also true for someone or some­thing else

trans.tran_cn: 也不，也不是，和 neither 或 not 连用，去甲
trans.tran_en: used when mentioning two things that are not true or do not happen

trans.tran_cn: (Nor)人名；(中)挪(广东话·威妥玛)；(马来、俄)诺尔；(柬)诺
